actionCalls.description: Update To Closed Lost Avoid Lock
actionCalls.name: Update_To_Closed_Lost_Avoid_Lock
actionCalls.label: Update To Closed Lost Avoid Lock

assignments.description: Required variable for accounting impact formula
assignments.name: Set_Multi_Select_Accounting_Impact_Value
assignments.label: Set Multi Select Accounting Impact Value

decisions.description: Route to approval screen if necessary approvals are not complete
decisions.name: Approvals_Negotiate_Approval_Check
decisions.label: Approvals -> Negotiate Approval Check

rules.name: Send_To_Negotiate_Errors
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND ((4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7) OR (8 AND 9)) AND (10 OR (11 AND 12) OR 13)
rules.label: Send To Negotiate Errors

decisions.description: Check If Closed Lost, Avoid Lock
decisions.name: Check_If_Closed_Lost_Avoid_Lock
decisions.label: Check If Closed Lost, Avoid Lock

decisions.name: Check_If_PM_Attached_And_Contract_Draft_Is_Set
decisions.label: Check If PM Attached And Contract Draft Is Set

rules.name: Stage_Moved_Backwards_Send_To_Stage_Error_Screen
rules.label: Stage Moved Backwards, Send To Stage Error Screen

decisions.description: Route To Error Screen If Approvals Are Outstanding
decisions.name: Discover_Solution_Approval_Check
decisions.label: Discover -> Solution Approval Check

decisions.description: Route To Solution Validation Error Screen
decisions.name: Solution_Approvals_Approval_Check
decisions.label: Solution -> Approvals Approval Check

decisions.description: Solution Past Approvals Without Pricing Approval Check
decisions.name: Solution_Past_Approvals_Without_Pricing_Approval_Check
decisions.label: Solution Past Approvals Without Pricing Approval Check

formulas.name: frml_error_beginning
formulas.expression: 'An Error Occurred, Please Reach Out To System Admin' + br() + 'details'

formulas.description: Require Monthly Active Users before existing Discover on all opps except CCTP Verite Read Only API Core API Circle Mint Account
formulas.name: frml_exclude_monthly_active_user
formulas.expression: OR( CONTAINS({!Get_Opportunity_By_Record_ID.Products_Selected__c}, "CCTP"), CONTAINS({!Get_Opportunity_By_Record_ID.Products_Selected__c}, "Verite"), CONTAINS({!Get_Opportunity_By_Record_ID.Products_Selected__c}, "Read Only API"), CONTAINS({!Get_Opportunity_By_Record_ID.Products_Selected__c}, "Core API"), CONTAINS({!Get_Opportunity_By_Record_ID.Products_Selected__c}, "Circle Mint Account") )

formulas.name: frml_term_sheet_approved

fields.name: Needs_Solution_Validation
fields.fieldText: Solution Must Be Validated Before Moving The Sales Stage To Compliance

fields.name: No_PM_Error
fields.fieldText: You must add a PM to the opportunity team before closing.

fields.name: ContractDraftError
fields.fieldText: The Contract Draft Status Must Be In Draft - With Customer In Order To Close Win

fields.name: MoU_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
You have a pending MoU request from the legal team.

Reach out to Legal to have them populate the memo of understanding field.

To cancel your request, update the MoU Request status field to be blank.

fields.name: Needs_pricing_fields_error
fields.fieldText:
Compliance Cannot Be Skipped Without Filling Out Custom Pricing & Are We Waiving Network Fees For Product Opportunities.


Please click the back button and change the stage to Compliance to advance and fill in the required fields.

fields.name: Pricing_Approval_Required
fields.fieldText: Pricing Approval Is Required Before Updating The Sales Stage

fields.name: DRG_Approval_Required
fields.fieldText: DRG Approval Is Required Before Updating The Sales Stage

fields.name: Compliance_Required
fields.fieldText: Compliance Is Required Before Updating The Sales Stage

fields.name: DRG_Rejected
fields.fieldText: DRG Has Rejected This Opportunity And You Can Not Progress It

fields.name: Product_Approval_Required
fields.fieldText: Manager Approval Is Required For Any Limited Products Before Updating The Sales Stage

fields.name: Kash_Approval_Required
fields.fieldText: Kash Approval Is Required For Any Exclusive Products Before Updating The Sales Stage

fields.name: Cant_Move_Backwards
fields.fieldText: You cannot move backwards to a previous stage.

fields.name: Cant_Move_Closed
fields.fieldText: You cannot move an opportunity from Closed Won or Closed Lost

fields.name: Term_sheet_error
fields.fieldText: Term Sheet Must Be Approved To Advance!

fields.name: MoU_Error
fields.fieldText: Memo Of Understanding Request Status Must Be Complete To Close A Deal

fields.name: Success_metrics_error
fields.fieldText: Success Metrics Must Be Filled To Advance

fields.name: PerformanceTypeError
fields.fieldText: Performance Incentive Type Must Be Filled To Advance

fields.name: LiquidityCoverageError
fields.fieldText: Liquidity Coverage Fields Must Be Filled To Advance

fields.name: Term_sheet_required_text
fields.fieldText: Term Sheet Must Be Approved By Customer To Advance

fields.name: Succes_Metrics_Required
fields.fieldText: * Success Metrics Is Required To Pass Solution

fields.name: AmountHelp
fields.fieldText: * Amount is specific to Activation Incentive Product (Not Performance Incentive)

fields.name: MidpointHelpText
fields.fieldText: * Incentive Payout fields are specific to Performance Incentive Product / ITP (Not Activation Incentive)

fields.name: PerformanceIncentiveTypeRequired
fields.fieldText: * Success Metrics Is Required To Pass Solution

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7)

fields.name: Save_Message
fields.fieldText: All fields displayed above must be filled in to advance. If no fields are displayed, click save to update stage.

textTemplates.name: tt_error
textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred, Please Reach Out To System Admin


Details:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}
